paths- absolute path & relative path
Image that we are talking about is entri.jpg
Relative path
->src="entri.jpg" - in the same folder as this file
->src="images/entri.jpg" - in the image folder and the image folder is in the same this file
->src="/images/entri.jpg" - in the image folder and the image folder is is at the root directory
->src="../entri.jpg" - in the image folder and the image folder is one level up from the folder

wherw are paths used in html?
->images
->style sheet(css)
->js files
->external links
->link to another html pageof the same project
